entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
